name: Vita Brevis (alpha)
description:
(Alpha build 0.1)

- - - - - Controls - - - - -

  • WASD = Move 
  • Shift = Sprint / Walk
  • Space = Jump / Double Jump
  • Ctrl = Crawl 
  • Right mouse button = Dash
  • q = Bite
  • e = Blink
  • t = Mist form
  • r = Climb surface
  • f = Return to normal gravity
  • TAB = active shape-shift biting
  • Escape = Quit

- - - - - Alpha Notes - - - - -

  • No sound yet
  • Sandbox gameplay
  • Comments, criticism, and feedback encouraged!
